question_text: What is the main technical requirement that allows a virtual desktop to function smoothly over a network?
answer_options: The client must have GPU acceleration
The server must share file permissions
The connection must support fast display updates and user input transmission
The VM must be stored locally on the thin client
correct_answer: The connection must support fast display updates and user input transmission
explanation: VDI relies on real-time screen updates and responsive input over the network; fast communication is essential.
